item.title: Collaboration
item.description: JASMIN JASMIN is a globally unique data intensive supercomputer for environmental science. JASMIN supports the data analysis requirements of the UK and European climate and earth system modelling community.

item.title: Enabling Science
item.description: We also run the UKSSDC and the IPCC-DDC data centres. Check out our other projects!
